rewrite1: In the tenth paragraph, set the first line indent to 10 points and modify the spacing following the paragraph to the equivalent of three lines.
rewrite2: For the tenth paragraph, set the first-line indent to 10 points and modify the spacing following the paragraph to be equivalent to three lines.
rewrite3: In the tenth paragraph, set the first line indentation to 10 points and modify the spacing following the paragraph to be equivalent to the height of three lines.
